DOC.detailed_description: Ten healthy person fast blood sample drawn ask randomly consume 50g glucose drink ( 2 occasion ) , 50g carbohydrate equivalent cook purple , red , yellow white potato . Further blood sample obtain 15,30 , 45 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 180 , 240 min . Bloods first 2 hour analyze glucose insulin determine glycemic response . Hourly blood sample analyze polyphenol determine bioavailability polyphenols different potato variety . Urine sample collect ingestion food item 4 hour , use determine polyphenol bioavailability .
